description: Mentioned only by Irwin in a list of mixture stops under the heading �Color Due to Stop Pitches�, with no definition. We can conjecture, from the Sept-Terz and the Terzian, that this may be a compound stop of three ranks 1-3/5' + 1-1/3' + 1-1/7'. Examples None known. Contributions welcome.
